attributes.action: To abolish the taxes on all tobacco goods given that we, as smokers, are increasingly seeing our right to smoke being eradicated by those who do not contribute an equal amount to the exchequer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For too long the anti smoking lobby have been given an unfair advantage in the smoking debate.  As smokers we have been an easy target for tax increases every year and have kept the economy solvent.  Now we are expected to keep paying unjust levels of tax on tobacco goods without the right to smoke whn and here we wish to.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
